resources.string:
OsmAnd supports displaying the offline vector maps in different map styles to suit your to needs: 

Other than the balanced 'default' map style, you may in 'Menu' → 'Configure screen' → 'Map Style' select for example 
	* The 'Touring view' style, which contains the most detailed information feasable for traveling and touring, including optimization for professional drivers (higher contrast, distinguishable roads), options for Alpine hiking (SAC scale), cycle routes, hiking symbol support, etc. 
	* 'High contrast roads' shows roads in very accentuated colors for bright ambient lighting situations 
	* 'Winter and ski' creates a (snow covered) winter landscape view, and shows global ski slopes and lifts (in connection with the 'World ski' map download)
Зьмены ў 1.6: \n\t* Вызначеньне/зьмена анлайн-крыніц квадратаў мапф (пазначце тэрмін дзеяньня)
Абярыце рэгіён для кіраваньня : ЗША, Еўропа, Вялікабрытанія, Азія і іншыя
Агалошваць назвы вуліц, дарожныя перасьцярогі (вымушаныя прыпынкі, ляжачыя паліцэйскія ), перасьцярогі аб камерах хуткасьці, абмежаваньні хуткасьці

Зьмены ў 1.5: 
	* Галасавыя папярэджваньні аб абмежаваньні хуткасьці і камерах 
	* Больш галасавых падказкак (агалошэньне назваў вуліц) 
	* Значкі для мапаў для экранаў высокае шчыльнасьці 
	* Шмат зьмен інтэрфейса 
	* Выпраўленьні памылык паказу адлегласці, аналізу GPX, апрацоўкі маршрутных кропак, віджэта планаваньня маршрута, загрузкі дадзеных ў OSM, працы з https
Калі ласка , пазначце карыстальніка OSM і ягоны пароль у наладах
У вас ужо ёсць набор прамежных кропак.
Выгляд мапы й налады навігацыі захоўваюцца для кожнага асобнага профілю. Вызначце Ваш стандартны профіль.

Зміни в 1.4: 
	* Магчымасьць аптымальнага ўпорадкаваньня промежных кропак маршруту (задача каміваяжора, сартаваньне па адлегласьці) 
	* Пошук вуліцы па назве (побач) 
	* Убудова планаваньня маршрутаў (сьцягваньне/редагаваньне/захавеньне GPX файлаў) 
	* Новы экран сьцягваньня 
	* Падтрымка ўкладзеных тэчак для GPX файлаў (упарадкуйце вашыя GPX файлы) 
	* Выдалены файлы SRTM 
	* Падтрымка OSM нататак
Прамежкавыя кропкі перасартыраваныя ў парадку шляху да месца прызначэньня.
Файл зьмяненьняў OSM пасьпяхова зтвораны ў %1$s
Збой рэзервовага капіяванья файлу зьмяненьняў OSM
Ствараць шляхі (ці выкарыстоўваць/рэдагаваць існуючыя файлы GPX) каб мераць адлегласьць паміж кропкамі. Захоўваць у GPX і потым карыстацца каб плянаваць шлях па GPX.
Прылада для разьліку адлегласьцей й плянаваньня

* Націсніце , каб адзначыць кропку.
 * Націсьніце і ўтрымлівайце на мапе, каб выдаліць папярэднюю кропку.
 * Націсьніце і ўтрымлівайце на кропцы, каб паглядзець і прыкласьці апісаньне.
 * Націсніце на віджэце вымярэньня, каб убачыць больш дзеяньняў.
Калі ласка, пачакайце, пакуль бягучая задача не будзе завершаная
Выкарыстоўваць фільтар Калман каб прадухіліць абэрацыю компасу
Рэжым даступнасці : Калі ласка, спачатку вылучыце прызначэнне
Выкарыстоўваць для працы компаса магнітны датчык замест датчыка арыентацыі
Зараз WiFi не падлучаны. Хочаце працягнуць сьцягваньне з бягучым падключэньнем да інтэрнэту?

Зьмены ў версіі 1.3: 
	* Перапісана падтрымка планшэтаў і вялікіх эканаў 
	* Тэма Holo (налады) 
	* Дадатковыя налады для стабілізацыі компасу 
	* Верхняя левая кнопка на экране мапы замяняе кнопку Меню
Наладжваньні запісу трэкаў і фонавага рэжыму

Дазволіць трэкінг й навігацыю ў сьпячым рэжыме(калі эрран выключаны) праз пэрыядычнае апытаньне прылады GPS. Паказаць налады што садзейнічаюць запісу вандровак ў лякальныя GPX файлы ці ў сеткавы вэб-сэрвіс.
Налады ўключэньня запісу трэкаў і навігацыі ў фоне (экран выключаны) шляхам перыядычнага абудджэньня прылады GPS.

Зьмены ў 1.2.1 
	*Выпраўлены Геа сэрвісы (Foursquare, c:geo) 
	*Выпраўлена дрыжаньне выявы пад час навігаціі 
	*Інші незначні виправлення 

Зьмены ў 1.2: 
	* Выпраўлены памылкі (маршруцізаціі, пошуку, запісу відэа/голасу, аудыё-падказак, некторыя паляпшэньні адлюстраваньня) 
	* Спрошчанае наланаладжваньне слою рэльефу (патрэбная убудова Ізаліній вышынь) 
	* Магчыма выкарыстоўваць спасылкі з maps.google.com 
	* Новы віджэт (GPS інфа) 
	* Дададзена падтрымка шматаконнага інтэрфейсу для апошніх мадэляў Samsung 
	* Фільтр Калмана для компаса 
	* Падтрымка гадзіньніка Pebble
Зьмены ў 1.1.4: \n\t* рэдызайн інтэрфейсу \n\t* Выпраўленыя памылкі

Зьмены ў 1.1.2: 
	* Паляпшэньне аўдыё/відэа убудовы (фота з інфармацыяй EXIF) 
	* Вапраўлена зручнасьць і рэструкрурызаваная убудова Ізалініі вышынь 
	* Пакет ценяў рэльефу для убудовы Ізалініі вышынь 
	* Выпраўленне памылак (неаптымальнай маршрутызацыі)
Сапраўды сьцерці месца прызначэньня (і кропкі шляху)?
Дазволіць вельмі дакладную навігацыю каб шукаць шлях без памылак. Толькі для невялікіх адлегласьцяў і бяз свойскіх бібліятэк.
Убудова Dropbox дазваляе сынхранізаваць трэкі і аўдыё/відэа натакi з вашым рахункам Dropbox.
Адчыніць ранейзапісаны GPX маршрут для навiгацыi?
Please consider to buy the Contour lines plugin in the Market to support further development.
Audio/video is being recorded. To stop it press the AV widget.
An audio from the specified recording is being played.\n%1$s
Do you want to remove this recording?

Changes in 1.1.0: 
	* Distance calculator plugin 
	* Audio/video notes plugin 
	* Contour lines plugin 
	* Bug fixes 
	* 'Touring view' map style option with more map details, new road styles, more contrast, and Alpine hiking (SAC scale) option 
	* EGM96 geoid offset correction for GPS altitude readings
OsmAnd plugin for offline contour lines

This plugin provides contour lines which can be displayed in OsmAnd\'s offline maps. The global data (between 70 degrees north and 70 degrees south) is based on measurements by SRTM (Shuttle Radar Topography Mission) and ASTER (Advanced Spaceborne Thermal Emission and Reflection Radiometer), an imaging instrument onboard Terra, the flagship satellite of NASA\'s Earth Observing System. ASTER is a cooperative effort between NASA, Japan\'s Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI), and Japan Space Systems (J-spacesystems).
Location to associate with the note is not defined yet. \"Use location …\" to assign a note to the specified location
Facilitates downloading offline contour lines and hillshades (\'Settings\' → \'Data Management\' → \'Download\' → Select desired map type).
Suppress display of regional boundaries (admin levels 5-9)
OsMoDroid plugin has an old version and needs to be updated.
OsMoDroid plugin is OsmAnd extension for OsModroid application for online tracking features. Information about the service is available on http://esya.ru.

Most GPS devices report altitude measurements in the ellipsoid-based WGS84 reference system, from which a conversion to locally used systems requires a position-dependent correction. 

A better approximation to these local systems is the EGM96 (geoid) reference. 

OsmAnd will display your positions's altitude in the EGM96 system after you download the file 'World Altitide Correction' (WW15MGH.DAC) via 'Settings' → 'Data Management'. (Original is at http://earth-info.nga.mil/GandG/wgs84/gravitymod/egm96/binary/WW15MGH.DAC.)
Select when to display roads-only maps:
Працаваць у бясьпечным рэжыме (трохі павольней але бяз свойскіх бібліятэк).
The application is running in safe mode (disable it in the Settings).
OsmAnd sleep mode service is still running. Do you want to turn it off?

Changes in 1.0.0: 
	* Improved routing: faster, more precise, up to 250 km 
	* Introduce roads-only maps 
	* Map does not lose position lock after interruptions 
	* Enable sleep mode service during navigation

Changes in 0.8.4: 
	* Some bug fixes 
	* Map does not lose position lock after interruptions 
	* Enable sleep mode service during navigation
ZXing Barcode Scanner application not installed. Search in Market?
Дазвольце ўбудову сэрвісаў хронікі каб запісваць каардынаты (запіс GPX, сеткавы трэкінг)
Разьлічваць прыблізны шлях на вялікія адлегласьці
Калі ласка, дазвольце GPS у наладах

Changes in 0.8.3: 
	* Waypoints 
	* Improved route guidance 
	* Added a setting which allows to avoid motorways while building a route 
	* Added one more type of roads for bicycles to the map (Cycleway=track) 
	* Bug fixes
You already have destination point set.
Waypoint %1$s too far from nearest road.
You have arrived at your waypoint
Ending point too far from nearest road.
Наладзіць папярэджаньні руху (абмежаваньня хуткасьці, вымушаныя прыпынкі, штучныя няроўнасьці), камэры хуткасьці, інфармацыю па палосах
Выкарыстоўваць компас калі інакш немагчыма вызначыць напрамак
Аўтаматычна памяншаць/павялічваць мапу згодна вашай хуткасьці (калі мапа сынхранізуецца з месцам)

Changes in 0.8.2: 
	* Improved Routing 
	* Dynamic map widgets 
	* Map settings moved to map screen 
	* Lock screen button with logging services 
	* Fixed Arabic, Kannada scripting and RTL languages
Global Mobile Map Viewing & Navigation for Offline and Online OSM Maps

OsmAnd (OSM Automated Navigation Directions)
OsmAnd is an open source navigation application with access to a wide variety of global OpenStreetMap (OSM) data. All map data (vector or tile maps) can be stored on the phone memory card for offline usage. OsmAnd also offers offline and online routing functionality including turn-by-turn voice guidance.
Some of the core features: - Complete offline functionality (store downloaded vector or tile maps in a selectable folder) - Compact offline vector maps for the whole world available - Download of country or region maps directly from the app - Overlay of several map layers possible, like GPX or navigation tracks, Points of Interest, favorites, contour lines, public transportation stops, additional maps with customizable transparency - Offline search for addresses and places (POIs) - Offline routing for short distances (experimental) - Car, bicycle, and pedestrian modes with: - optional automated day/night view switching - optional speed-dependent map zooming - optional map alignment according to compass or direction of motion - optional lane guidance, speed limit display, recorded and TTS voices
Limitations of this free version of OsmAnd: - Number of map downloads limited - No access to Wikipedia offline POIs
OsmAnd is actively being developed and our project and its further progress relies on financial contributions to fund the development and testdriving new functionality. Please consider buying OsmAnd+, or funding specific new features or making a general donation on osmand.net.

OsmAnd (OSM Automated Navigation Directions) is a map and navigation application with access to the free, worldwide, and high-quality OpenStreetMap (OSM) data. All map data can be stored on your device\'s memory card for offline use. Via your device\'s GPS, OsmAnd offers routing, with optical and voice guidance, for car, bike, and pedestrian. All the main functionalities work both online and offline (no internet needed).
Some of the main features:
Navigation - Works online (fast) or offline (no roaming charges when you are abroad) - Turn-by-turn voice guidance (recorded and synthesized voices) - Optional lane guidance, street name display, and estimated time of arrival - Supports intermediate points on your itinerary - Automatic re-routing whenever you deviate from the route - Search for places by address, by type (e.g.: restaurant, hotel, gas station, museum), or by geographical coordinates
Map Viewing - Display your position and orientation on the map - Optionally align the map according to compass or your direction of motion - Save your most important places as Favorites - Display POIs (point of interests) around you - Can display specialized online tile maps - Can display satellite view (from Bing) - Can display different overlays like touring/navigation GPX tracks and additional maps with customizable transparency - Optionally display place names in English, local, or phonetic spelling
Use OpenStreetMap and Wikipedia Data: - High quality information from the best collaborative projects of the world - Global maps from OpenStreetMap, available per country or region - Wikipedia POIs, great for sightseeing (not available in free version) - Unlimited free download, directly from the app (download limit 16 map files in free version) - Always up-to-date maps (updated at least once a month) - Compact offline vector maps - Select between complete map data and just road network (Example: All of Japan is 700 MB, or 200 MB for the road network only) - Also supports online or cached tile maps
Safety Features - Optional automated day/night view switching - Optional speed limit display, with reminder if you exceed it - Optional speed-dependent map zooming - Share your location so that your friends can find you
Bicycle and Pedestrian Features - The maps include foot, hiking, and bike paths, great for outdoor activities - Special routing and display modes for bike and pedestrian - Optional public transport stops (bus, tram, train) including line names - Optional trip recording to local GPX file or online service - Optional speed and altitude display - Display of contour lines and hill-shading (via additional plugin)
Directly Contribute to OpenStreetMap - Report map bugs - Upload GPX tracks to OSM directly from the app - Add POIs and directly upload them to OSM (or later if offline) - Optional trip recording also in background mode (while device is in sleep mode)
OsmAnd is open source and actively being developed. Everyone can contribute to the application by reporting bugs, improving translations, or coding new features. The project is in a lively state of continuous improvement by all these forms of developer and user interaction. The project progress also relies on financial contributions to fund the development, coding, and testing of new functionalities. By buying OsmAnd+ you help the application to be even more awesome! It is also possible to fund specific new features, or to make a general donation on osmand.net.

Global Mobile Map Viewing & Navigation for Offline and Online OSM Maps

OsmAnd+ (OSM Automated Navigation Directions)
OsmAnd+ is an open source navigation application with access to a wide variety of global OpenStreetMap (OSM) data. All map data (vector or tile maps) can be stored on the phone memory card for offline usage. OsmAnd also offers offline and online routing functionality including turn-by-turn voice guidance.
OsmAnd+ is the paid application version, by buying it you support the project, fund the development of new features, and receive the latest updates.
Some of the core features: - Complete offline functionality (store downloaded vector or tile maps in a selectable folder) - Compact offline vector maps for the whole world available - Unlimited downloading of country or region maps directly from the app - Offline Wikipedia feature (download Wikipedia POIs), great for sightseeing - Overlay of several map layers possible, like GPX or navigation tracks, Points of Interest, favorites, contour lines, public transportation stops, additional maps with customizable transparency - Offline search for addresses and places (POIs) - Offline routing for short distances (experimental) - Car, bicycle, and pedestrian modes with: - optional automated day/night view switching - optional speed-dependent map zooming - optional map alignment according to compass or direction of motion - optional lane guidance, speed limit display, recorded and TTS voices

OsmAnd (OSM Automated Navigation Directions) is a map and navigation application with access to the free, worldwide, and high-quality OpenStreetMap (OSM) data. All map data can be stored on your device\'s memory card for offline use. Via your device\'s GPS, OsmAnd offers routing, with optical and voice guidance, for car, bike, and pedestrian. All the main functionalities work both online and offline (no internet needed).
OsmAnd+ is the paid application version. By buying it you support the project, fund the development of new features, and receive the latest updates. You can test the application before buying by installing the free version called OsmAnd.
Some of the main features:
Navigation - Works online (fast) or offline (no roaming charges when you are abroad) - Turn-by-turn voice guidance (recorded and synthesized voices) - Optional lane guidance, street name display, and estimated time of arrival - Supports intermediate points on your itinerary - Automatic re-routing whenever you deviate from the route - Search for places by address, by type (e.g.: restaurant, hotel, gas station, museum), or by geographical coordinates
Map Viewing - Display your position and orientation on the map - Optionally align the map according to compass or your direction of motion - Save your most important places as Favorites - Display POIs (point of interests) around you - Can display specialized online tile maps - Can display satellite view (from Bing) - Can display different overlays like touring/navigation GPX tracks and additional maps with customizable transparency - Optionally display place names in English, local, or phonetic spelling
Use OpenStreetMap and Wikipedia Data: - High quality information from the best collaborative projects of the world - Global maps from OpenStreetMap, available per country or region - Wikipedia POIs, great for sightseeing - Unlimited free download, directly from the app - Always up-to-date maps (updated at least once a month) - Compact offline vector maps - Select between complete map data and just road network (Example: All of Japan is 700 MB, or 200 MB for the road network only) - Also supports online or cached tile maps
Safety Features - Optional automated day/night view switching - Optional speed limit display, with reminder if you exceed it - Optional speed-dependent map zooming - Share your location so that your friends can find you
Bicycle and Pedestrian Features - The maps include foot, hiking, and bike paths, great for outdoor activities - Special routing and display modes for bike and pedestrian - Optional public transport stops (bus, tram, train) including line names - Optional trip recording to local GPX file or online service - Optional speed and altitude display - Display of contour lines and hill-shading (via additional plugin)
Directly Contribute to OpenStreetMap - Report map bugs - Upload GPX tracks to OSM directly from the app - Add POIs and directly upload them to OSM (or later if offline) - Optional trip recording also in background mode (while device is in sleep mode)
OsmAnd is open source and actively being developed. Everyone can contribute to the application by reporting bugs, improving translations, or coding new features. The project is in a lively state of continuous improvement by all these forms of developer and user interaction. The project progress also relies on financial contributions to fund the development, coding, and testing of new functionalities. By buying OsmAnd+ you help the application to be even more awesome! It is also possible to fund specific new features, or to make a general donation on osmand.net.

Up-to-date map data is essential for offline map viewing, for POI/address search, and for offline navigation. OsmAnd provides a data manager to download these offline maps (and some other data files), and to check for available updates. 

To download maps go to 'Settings' → 'Data Management' → 'Download offline data'. 

After the global region list is retrieved from the internet, click on any entry to download or update a file. Please note the file type selector near the top of the screen to select the type of download you want (regular maps, hillshade overlays, etc.). 

You can filter the region list by typing some letters, or you may select the option 'Settings' → 'Filter downloaded' to see updates only for the data already on your device. 

	* Entries in 'green' indicate data files identical on device and server 
	* Entries in 'blue' indicate available updates on server 
	* Entries in italic font indicate data de-activated on the device
Choose location of position marker on the map

Дзякуй за карыстаньне OsmAnd. Каб карыстацца ўсімі магчымасьцямі праграмы, вам патрэбныя некаторыя пазасеціўныя зьвесткі для вашага рэгіёну. Іх можна зладаваць праз \'Налады\' → \'Кіраваньне зьвесткамі\'. Пасьля гэтага вы зможаце глядзець мапу, шукаць адрасы, бачыць цікавосткі і грамадзкі транспарт.

Changes in 0.8.0: 
	- *Plugin functionality* 
	 - Most functionality is grouped by features and can be enabled/disabled in the Settings/Plugins. You can enable (online or cached) tile map sources, tracking settings, and many other new and previously existing features. 
	- *New offline map data support* 
	 - Map rendering becomes faster and more precise (coastline and flooded area problems are mainly fixed). 
	 - You need to download completely new offline data (old data will not be supported anymore) 
	- *Offline Routing* 
	 - Offline routing becomes more robust 
	 *Usability and UI experience* 
	 - Improved in many areas
Паказваць налады патрэбныя для зваротнай сувязі OSM накшталт збору/зьменаў цікавосткаў, стварэньня/камэнтаваньня хібаў OSM і дасыланьня запісаных файлаў GPX (патрабуе лагін/пароль OSM).

	- Actuality also of deactivated index files now shown on Download screen in dark green and dark blue

You can toggle whether and how the map display is rotated by repeatedly clicking on the map screen's compass icon. 

The choices are: 
	* 'Don't rotate (north is up)': Map will not be rotated. North will be always up 
	* 'To direction of movement': Map will continuously be aligned with your heading 
	* 'To compass': Map will continuously be aligned with the device's compass reading
Download successful. \n\t\n\tTo use activate \'Menu\' → \'Map layers\' → \'Map source…\' → \'Offline vector maps\'.

The map appearance can for offline vector maps be changed between day (brighter) and night (darker). Night colors are safer and more comfortable for night driving. 

You can set a policy for day/night switching in 'Menu' → 'Configure screen' → 'Day/night map'. 

The choices are: 
	* 'Sunrise/Sunset': automatic mode, controlled by the position of the sun (default) 
	* 'Day': always use day mode 
	* 'Night': always use night mode 
	* 'Light sensor': map appearance is controlled by the device's light sensor (only if equipped)

OsmAnd uses maps based on Openstreetmap.org (OSM) data and can directly be used to improve OSM data quality. You can create and upload new POI or OSM bug reports with just a few clicks. 

For this you need to activate the 'OSM Editing' plugin under 'Settings' → 'Plugins', then provide your OSM login information in 'Settings' → 'OSM editing'. 

To add a new POI use option 'Create POI' in the 'Use location' context menu. Proceed with entering the information about the new POI in 'Create POI' dialogue and finally commit it. 

Also errors in maps can immediately be reported via an OSM bug, so the OSM community can then fix this problem. Use the option 'Open OSM bug' in the 'Use location' context menu. Then enter the detailed description of the problem and finally post it using the 'Add' button. 

OsmAnd supports caching your entries offline (see respective setting), but Internet connectivity is of course needed to upload your OSM POI and OSM bug contributions.
Няма вольнага месца каб зладаваць %1$s MB (вольна: %2$s).
Вольнага месца зараз {2} MB! Зладаваць {0} файлы ({1} MB)?

To get directions to a place, either directly long-click on it on the map, (then tap its description marker and select 'Directions to'), or select 'Directions' after tapping any entry in a search results list or favorite list. 

The destination is marked as an orange target flag marker on the map and OsmAnd displays the distance to it and the direction to it (orange triangle). 

You may chose either 'Start navigation', which means that OsmAnd would live-guide you, give you voice instructions (if enabled), etc. Or you can select 'Display route', resulting in static route without any live-guideance or adjustments as you move. 

To display a route to the selected destination from any point other than your current position, select the start point on the map and tap 'Directions from'. 

If you use 'Directions from' together with 'Start navigation', OsmAnd will switch to your actual position as soon as it is found (so this can be used to jump-start routing before the position is found), while 'Directions from' in combination with 'Display route' just shows you the route from any arbitrary point you had selected without subsequent updates.

Changes in 0.6.9 : 
	- Improved offline map rendering 
	- Fast Native offline rendering - look in experimental features (may not work on some devices) 
	- Massive look and feel changes 
	- Altitude info 
	- New translations (Vienamese, Polish) 
	- Other small features

Changes in 0.6.8: 
	- Completely redesigned search (POI, Address)! Make address search much faster and more responsive. Create one Search interface with many different options. 
	- Implement POI search by name in big areas (countries) 
	- Fix flickering map screen for tablets (Issue 641) 
	- Auto-center map view option (Issue 356) 
	- GPX navigation moved to 'Directions' and 'Save Directions' moved to 'About route' 
	- POI data included in .obf file (all download indexes after 01/10/11) 
	- Voice prompt fixes (GPS position fix, omitting first command) 
	- Small improvements

Recent changes for 0.6.7: 
	- Offline data manager (download, delete, activate / deactivate offline data directly in OsmAnd) 
	- Favorite points and groups (categorize, delete, manage favorites) 
	- GPX Explorer in application (view track detail, distance, average speed, elevation, etc.) 
	- GPX navigation (more options, continue navigation after crash, support roundabouts) 
	- Function to save route as GPX track for offline use 
	- Improve GPX monitoring (filter some inaccurate position and save accuracy/elevation/speed) 
	- Upload GPX to OSM community (http://download.osmand.net/gpx/) 
	- Improve vector rendering 
	- Improvement of TTS engine (announce exact distance, enable miles) 
	- Bug fixes

You can share the location of interesting places on your trip with family or friends via the \'Use location\' context menu → \'Share location\'. \n\nThen chose a way to share your location. The choices are: E-Mail, SMS(text), or just copy the location coordinates to the device clipboard.

Frequently used points can be saved as Favorites, as follows: 

In the 'Use location' context menu for any point, select option 'Add to favorites' and then enter a name for it. 

After saving a Favorite, it is accessible via 'Menu' → 'Favorites'. Tapping on any entry in the 'Favorites' list provides options like to navigate to it, edit or delete it. 

To display all Favorite points directly on the map, on the map screen enable layer 'Favorites' in 'Menu' → 'Map layers'.
Online OSM map classification with images

The map source and map layers displayed are changed via 'Menu' → 'Map layers'. 

Under 'Map source…' you can choose using the pre-loaded offline vector maps (default, also needed for offline navigation), or predefined (online or cached offline) tile sources (activate the 'Online maps' plugin under 'Settings' → 'Plugins' for this), or maps manually created using e.g. OsmAndMapCreator on a PC. 

OsmAnd also supports custom sources.

OsmAnd supports different (customizable) application profiles for different use cases. \n\nYou can change profiles via the profile button in the lower left corner of the map screen (icon car, bicycle, or pedestrian), or when creating a route (\'transport mode\').

You can search for places directly on the map via 'Use location' → 'Search near here', or by calling the search screen via 'Menu' → 'Search'. 

The search screen provides templates for searching 
	* by address 
	* via coordinates 
	* as POI (by type or by name) 
	* via your search history 
	* or via your predefined favorites. 

For all hits a context menu or action bar offers options like 'Directions' or 'Show on map', etc.

The 'Use location' context menu contains all actions referring to a point (location). 

It is available by long-pressing any point on the map (then tapping its marker), or by pressing the trackball button, or by selecting 'Menu' → 'Use location' (the last two ways take the map center as reference). 

A marker box can be hidden again by long-clicking on it.
OsmAnd is a navigation application with many features. \n\nAs a basic introduction, some usage tips and tricks are linked via \'Menu\' → \'Tips\' from the map screen.
To see location follow the web browser link %1$s or android intent link %2$s
